original_text: And when they came to the region of the Jordan that is in the land of Canaan, the people of Reuben and the people of Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh built there an altar by the Jordan, an altar of imposing size.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 므낫세 반 지파가 가나안 땅 요단 언덕 가에 이르자 거기서 요단 가에 제단을 쌓았는데 보기에 큰 제단이었더라

sentences.original_text: And when they came to the region of the Jordan
that is in the land of Canaan
the people of Reuben and the people of Gad
built there an altar by the Jordan
